channel.title: Xchat Fails - No more connections permitted from your host
channel.description:
Connected. Now logging in... * *** Looking up your hostname... * *** Checking Ident * *** Found your hostname * *** No Ident response * Closing Link: ************* (No more connections permitted from your host) * Disconnected (Remote host closed socket).
What can I do to get around this or switch hosts?

item.title: Xchat Fails - No more connections permitted from your host
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It means that the IRC network is banning Tor users.

Only options: See if that IRC network provides a solution for Tor users, switch the IRC network or use a user -> Tor -> ssh/vpn/proxy for circumvention.

Read full topic
item.source: Xchat Fails - No more connections permitted from your host

item.title: Xchat Fails - No more connections permitted from your host
item.dc:creator: guffguys2
item.description:
Connected. Now logging in…

  • *** Looking up your hostname…
  • *** Checking Ident
  • *** Found your hostname
  • *** No Ident response
  • Closing Link: ************* (No more connections permitted from your host)
  • Disconnected (Remote host closed socket).

What can I do to get around this or switch hosts?

Read full topic
